name: Granite Oak
description:
Granite Oak is a diversified investment holding company, investing in high growth startups globally.

Our VC fund “Two Culture Capital” has invested in over 30 startups and growth businesses worldwide. Our deep industry networks generate extraordinary deal flow and enable us to actively support our portfolio companies. We are highly selective and maintain a diversified portfolio that spans a wide range of industries, including Fintech, IoT, Consumer Brands and Food & Beverage.
